#summary Lists articles about Course Builder use cases.

= Course Builder Articles =

On this page, we list articles relevant to Course Builder. Articles are in alphabetical order.

  * [http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2013/04/advanced-power-searching-with-google.html Advanced Power Searching with Google: Lessons Learned] by Dan Russell and Maggie Johnson
  * [http://oli.stanford.edu/news/2014/4/30/an-approach-to-knowledge-component-skill-modeling-in-online-courses An Approach to Knowledge Component/Skill Modeling in Online Courses] by Open Learning Initiative
  * [http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2013/09/a-comparison-of-five-google-online.html A Comparison of Five Google Online Courses] by Julia Wilkowski
  * [http://www.mooc-ed.org/coursebuilder-integration-with-vanilla-forums/ Coursebuilder Integration with Vanilla Forums] by Mark Samberg
  * [http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2012/09/helping-world-to-teach.html Helping the World to Teach] by Peter Norvig
  * [ArticleDrupalwithCB Integrating Drupal with Course Builder] by Course Builder staff
  * [http://www.softwaresecretweapons.com/jspwiki/khan-academy-exercises-in-course-builder Khan Academy Exercises in Course Builder] by Pavel Simakov
  * [http://www.learningsolutionsmag.com/articles/1327/moving-beyond-moocs-experiments-in-non-traditional-product-education Moving Beyond MOOCs: Experiments in Non-traditional Product Education] by Julia Wilkowski (*latest*)
  * [http://blog.ellismichael.com/2013/08/search-for-course-builder.html Search for Course Builder] by Ellis Michael
  * [http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2013/06/some-innovative-moocs.html Some Innovative MOOCs] by Maggie Johnson
  * [http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2012/08/teaching-world-to-search.html Teaching the World to Search] by Maggie Johnson 
  * [http://johnmcox.blogspot.com/2013/05/working-with-course-builder-data.html Working with Course Builder Data and ETL] by John Cox
